titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous emulsion of a modified aliphatic amine mixture of: decanedioic acid, compounds with 1,3- benzene-dimethanamine-bisphenol A-bisphenol A diglycidyl ether-diethylenetriamine glycidyl phenyl ether reaction product-epichlorohydrinformaldehyde- propylene oxide-triethylenetetramine polymer.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous emulsion of a modified aliphatic amine mixture of: decanedioic acid, compounds with 1,3- benzene-dimethanamine-bisphenol A-bisphenol A diglycidyl ether-diethylenetriamine glycidyl phenyl ether reaction product-epichlorohydrinformaldehyde- propylene oxide-triethylenetetramine polymer.
